text: QSO J0529-4351 is a quasar. It is the most luminous (or brightest) thing in space (as of 2024's first quarter).(The Guardian)(Nature Astronomy)https://yle.fi/a/74-20075472. Retrieved 2024-02-20 However, information published in 2022's second quarter, has been used in research, to try to find out if the star is in the Milky Way; According to [ computer software or] automated analysis, there is a [c. 99% or] 99.98% chance that the star is in the Milky Way. == References == Category:Quasars
title: QSO J0529-4351
